title: Virtual Reality Content Production Workshop for Strengthening 21st-Century Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Learner-centered activity design using smartphone-based virtual reality creation tools, featuring a language education content production project to enhance workplace applicability for working learners.

learning_goals: Learners can creatively design language learning scenarios using virtual reality content creation tools.
Learners can communicate effectively with peers during the virtual reality content development process via collaboration tools.
Learners can critically evaluate the educational effectiveness of their produced virtual reality content.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
